title: Envoys of four nations present credentials to President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Four foreign envoys including three Ambassadors and a High Commissioner, presented their credentials to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at a ceremony which was held at the Presidential Secretariat today on 26 June 2012. Accordingly three (3) new Ambassadors from Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Republic of…
